hero.name: Cat Vy
hero.title: AI Product Owner
hero.subtitle: I'm an AI Product Owner who loves building practical systems with GenAI, LLMs and elegant UX.

highlights.title: What I Do
highlights.description: Design AI-first product strategies, plan user flows, and define system behaviors across microservices.

highlights.title: What I Build
highlights.description: End-to-end LLM systems, multi-agent frameworks, and tools that empower humans to build faster.

highlights.title: What I Write
highlights.description: Blog posts on AI ethics, product discovery, system design, and prompt engineering best practices.

projects.title: Smart Agent Orchestrator
projects.description: An agent coordination system to orchestrate LangChain + Autogen agents.

projects.title: Voice-to-Doc
projects.description: Speech-to-text system for meeting transcription and summarization.

projects.title: Prompt Pro Studio
projects.description: Prompt experimentation platform for OpenAI, Claude, Cohere with RAG pipeline.
